title: lednikirastayut
author: lednikirastayut
content: Hi.Please treat seriously. There are a lot of satellites, flying at orbit. Also, there is still no publicly available technology stack, allowing to scan brain activity remotely. But, as a regular Earth human being, i assume there're both technologies and people using them in a way nobody knows about. Beginning with very private labs, factories and other units, up to military groups and governmental mils. This fact makes me seriously worry about availability of my brain to be freely scanned by satellites, running at Earth orbit.So long, does it become totally insecure to use passwords? Or worse, any tools, which involve our feelings and memory usage at all? Cause if user uses passwords, then ofc he needs to 1) imagine pass, 2) enter it, 3) remember it. All these actions are technically visible, as long as brain emits (otherwise we wouldn't be able to do MRI and other scans in clinics). Just assume, if there's somebody, who knows how to capture brain emission remotely, and knows how to interpret it to obtain data, that user 1) imagines, 2) enters and 3) remembers.How user may secure his bitcoins, considering all the above? I mean is there any software way to keep bitcoins safe, without knowing or even seeing any sensitive data, keeping able to initialize wallet and send/receive transactions? Or maybe any hardware advice?

comments.author: Ucy
comments.body: Simply don't feed from the system... and things will be harder for mind probing tech to know. Even feeding alot from the system alone without mind probing tech gives "bad actors" more advantages.Mind probing tech are typically very limited with what they can get or see. You could compare them to different intensities of lights from different torch lights... The higher the torch light intensity the more things are revealed by the torch... the lower/dimmer the less. The mind probing tech are somewhat similar. Fortunately the most advanced one available could only see little comparable to what the dimmest light could see in thick darkness in area the size of about 100 football field.Just make sure they don't understand you. This will be more like an encryption.
